site_settings.Support: Your friendly partners at FAIS are working to address this, but please feel free to [contact for more information or concerns](mailto:fail@wsu.edu).

tips.title: Server Tip:
tips.message: A **`staging` site** is a site that you prep date while testing new features and functionality that will go in to the production environment.

tips.title: Editing Tip:
tips.message: You are able to use hotkeys such as `Ctrl + c` to copy, but also use the `tab` key to move through the inputs
